column12: Description
column14: Loss Message

column12: Группа организованных гнилушек проникла за ворота в Тропе Деревьев и препятствует въезду в лес. Кто-то должен их убрать!
column14: Группа нанесла большой ущерб дороге.

column12: Крупных выделений Слизи стало гораздо больше за последние дни. Нужно обезопасить Деревню! Побей 7 из них.
column14: Деревенские слишком напуганы, чтобы работать.

column12: Несколько Гнилых Корней проросли на Перекрестке. Не могли бы вы вырубить их?
column14: Стражам пришлось тратить свое время на вырезку корней.

column12: Зловонные корни проросли в Белл-Роу. Срежьте их, пока кто-нибудь не пострадал!
column14: Гнилые Корни проросли и нанесли ущерб.

column12: По ночам на Белл-Роу собирается толпа Желудей, кажется они собирают Слизь. Избавьтесь от них!
column14: Поляне пришлось самой сражатсья с Желудями.

column12: Гломпы ночью на Перекрестке бегали по скалистым выступам. Нам нужно, чтобы кто-то выгнал хотя бы одного после захода солнца.
column13: Гломпы больше не будут доставлять проблем.
column14: Гломпы нанесли ущерб Перекрестку.

column12: Летний Бар просит помощи в очистке от Гнили, которая хочет пересечь Тропу Лилий в Бухте Ракушек
column14: Просьба провалена.

column12: Еще один мост был отключен. Нам нужен кто-то, кто войдет в Доки и активирует нужные узлы.
column13: Мост в Бухту Ракушек был восстановлен!
column14: Рабочие так и не смогли добраться до Бухты Ракушек

column12: Река была засорена группой Речных Луковиц. Нам нужно, чтобы кто-то выдернул из с помощью Лозоходца!
column14: Производство Росы было остановлена забитой Рекой.

column12: Мост от Весенней Деревни до Реки отключен. Вы можете добраться до него через Поворот чтобы снова включить.
column14: Рабочие так и не смогли выбраться с Реки.

column12: Несколько Слизней подняли шум и снесли ограждение Рект! Кто-то должен вбить колышки обратно молотком!
column14: Стражам пришлось защищать Деревню от Гнили.

column12: Скважины на Повороте вышли из строя из-за работ группы Сили. Они хотят, чтобы их починили с помощью какого-нибудь сока.
column13: Доступ к Росе для деревенских восстановлен.
column14: Группа Сили весь день была без Росы и это уничтожило урожай.

column12: Слизняки пытались вломиться в Дом. Нам нужен сок из заросших пней, чтобы залатать трещины! Может ли кто-нибудь положить 2 шарика сока в продуктовый ящик?
column14: Дом растрескался еще сильнее.

column12: Бабушке Смит приходится перетачивать инструменты Стражей, и она просит осколки стекла с пляжа! Нам нужно 4 в Продуктовой коробке!
column13: Все Стражи благодарны вам за новые инструменты!
column14: Стражам пришлось самим точить своим инструменты.

column12: Нашей Таверне нужна 1 Стеклянная Линза, чтобы обновить старую посуду. Может ли кто-нибудь найти ее и положить в Продуктовую коробку? Линза выпадает из банок на берегу.
column14: Много Росы было потеряно из-за старой разбитой посуды.
Request Failed

column12: Деревянные баррикады, которые мы построили были разрушены. Три водных Ростка помогли бы нам защитить дерево от Гнили! Лозоискатель поможет вытащить Ростки из воды в Деревне!
column14: Деревенским пришлось работать допоздна чтобы починить баррикады.

column12: A package of Candle Wax needs to be grabbed from Spring Hamlet's Docks and delivered to Lilyputt in the Summer Bar. Be careful as Rot have been spotted along the path!
column14: The Rot ate our expected package.

column12: Пакет, полный материалами для Росы выброшен на берег в Цветущем побережье. Кто-то должен забрать его пока Гниль до него не добралась. Группа Сили в Изгибе может его использовать!
column13: Материалы для Росы были пущены в ход!
column14: Гниль полакомилась содержимым пакетом.

column12: The water level in Quiet Shore is getting a bit high in some areas. Someone needs to pull some of the levers up and restore proper water flow before we get flooded!
column14: Water overflowed into Quiet Shore, damaging the Visitor Center.

column12: Another Dam has accidentally reactivated in Summer's End. Can someone tinker with the levers there before the place floods?
column14: Water overflowed into Summer's End, hurting the fauna.

column12: Three safety-rails around the Outpost have worn down to the point of breaking! They can be repaired with Sandstone!
column13: The Outpost is safe for visitors again!
column14: Some villagers got hurt due to the broken rails.

column12: Our Architect needs someone to retrieve a package from Spring Hamlet and deliver it to the workshop in Quiet Shore.
column14: The package was delivered by guards at night.

column12: We have a shipment of HEAVY Limestone for Autumn Town. We need someone to get it all the way to Breezy Walkabout.
column14: Autumn Town had to make do without the Limestone.

column12: The Rot busted some of our Rain Catchers' foliage in Summer's End! We need someone to place new Succulents into the beds, so they can continue to hold water.
column13: Water access was preserved in Summer's End.
column14: Pagu and Coqui went without access to Dew.

column12: Could anyone with free time clear out of the debris that's clogging the gutters near Lilyputt?
column13: The gutters flowed into the crops properly!
column14: With water backed up, the gutters overflowed and caused damage.

column12: Our freshwater crop aren't holding water properly. If someone can force the dam nearby back up with levers, the beds should hold water again.
column14: Request Failed

column12: A few Shelled Rots have taken up residence in Lily Landing. De-shell both of them so others can deal with them safely.
column13: Lily Landing successfully cleared of Rot.
column14: The Shelled Rots prevented anyone from entering Lily Landing.

column12: Weird tentacles have popped up in Reef Ridge. They're concerning some of the Seafolk.
column14: Many Seafolk were traumatized by the creepy Tentacles.

column12: Acorns have walked on over to Shell Cove in Spring Hamlet! No one's getting in and out of the Summer Bar while they're there.
column13: Shell Cove was properly cleared of Rot.
column14: Acorns scared off villagers travelling between towns.

column12: The Waterlog is beginning to overflow, Rot might be gathering too much moisture. Someone needs to clear out 5 shelled Rot in there.
column14: Request Failed

column12: Reef Ridge is overrun with Oozes, eating at the local Mangroves. We rely on the Mangrove trees to help keep the Summer Bar cool!
column14: Request Failed

column12: Some of the Seafolk want some Succulent leaves to make Dew for the visiting Greenlings. If we could get 3 of them in a Forage Box, it'd help a bunch!
column13: Fresh Dew successfully made for the Greenlings!
column14: Seafolk had to gather succulents for the local Greenlings.

column12: Skimmer is looking for 2 Azure Shells to complete a small study. Someone needs to deposit those into a Forage Box!
column14: Skimmer was unable to continue their work.

column12: Ceph needs a Yellow Shell to repair their shield! It's commonly found underwater in the Summer Bar. Just 1 in a Forage Box will help!
column13: Ceph was able to repair their shield easily!
column14: Ceph had to take time off guard duty to gather shells.

column12: Lilyputt is in need of Driftwood to maintain the bridge to the Outpost! They want 3 pieces in a Forage Box by the end of the day!
column13: Lilyputt was able to make crucial repairs!
column14: The frogs of Lilyputt sleep in broken homes tonight.

column12: Spring Hamlet is requesting a large export of six Sandstone for tool smithing, They are offering us vital resources in return!
column13: The package to Spring Hamlet is ready for them!
column14: The package went undelivered.

column12: The roots around the Sewer entrance are growing in. They need to be trimmed off.
column14: The Rot roots are breaking the Aqueduct.

column12: Oozes have been multiplying lately. If we can cut their numbers by 7, it would help.
column14: The Ooze dispersed, endangering other parts of the Grove.

column12: The Rot are finding new places to hide. If someone could clear 8 haystacks from the streets, it'd make the farmers feel much safer.
column14: Our farmers had anxiety all day.

column12: A trio of Rotting Acorns are hanging out in the Wheatfield. It's making the Trader feel uneasy.
column14: The Acorns harmed the Trader.

column12: Some extra-large rowdy Rot has surfaced from the Sewer Entrance, looking for a fight. Be careful!
column13: The Rot returned, content with Concord's fight.
column14: The Glomps did some damage to the field.

column12: Fences around da Wheatfield need to be fixed for general safety. Can't be too careful, with all the old Greenlings here. Can someone use a hammer to whack 'em down?
column13: The fences were fixed, preventing further damage.
column14: Fuji had to take time out of their day to fix the fences.

column12: Wells on both da Steppes are broken. Three of dem need a new Cornerstone foundation if da farmers are gonna use 'em.
column13: The farmers had access to Dew.
column14: Some crops died due to the water shortage.

column12: Dem old pipes are acting up in da Sewer. If you can get down there, give 2 of them a good hit.
column13: The sewer pipe was cleared successfully.
column14: The sewer pipe burst, causing damage.

column12: Lilyputt has left us a box of spores meant to replenish da bridge in Breezy Walkabout. We need someone to retrieve the package in Lily Landing!
column14: The package was left unattended, exposing it to night-time Rot.

column12: It's been feeling really arid in Autumn Town recently. It'd do us some good to repair our shady structures in Plantation Village with a few Pith Shoots.
column13: Villagers were able to cool off in the shade.
column14: The Autumn heat overwhelmed some villagers.

column12: Wheatfield's people have reported an issue with their water-access. Their well is probably leaking again. A few screws from the Sewer should tighten up those rivets.
column13: The Wheatfield retained all of its potable water!
column14: Autumn Town lost a lot of water overnight.

column12: The land drying out rapidly due to the climate! Luckily, Winter Glade sent a delivery of ice to Breezy Walkabout. It's melted by now, but the water would be very helpful to Kalo in Wheatfield, if someone could move it there!
column13: Wheatfield was able to resist the drought.
column14: Wheatfield is suffering from drought.

column12: Due to Rot activity in the town, our roof is falling apart. We need 3 Pith Roots in a Forage Box, so I can use the husks.
column13: Villager housing was properly patched up!
column14: Autumn Villagers sleep in broken homes tonight.

column12: Dillford's requesting 2 Rot Baubles from the Sewer. They'll check the Forage Boxes for them!
column13: Dillford was able to get the Rot samples they needed.
column14: Dillford's request went unfulfilled.

column12: Haupia wants us to start building a cache of Cornerstone. For when the floors get shaky again. Three of them in a Forage Box should be enough.
column14: Plantation Village remains unready for the next break in their foundation.

column12: The foundation of our Autumn Town is falling apart. A heavy package of Limestone is waiting for us in Shell Cove. We need it delivered to Breezy Walkabout
column13: Kalo was able to use the Limestone for repairs!
column14: Autumn Town did not get the resources it needed.

column12: We'd like a bunch of Cobblestone to upkeep what's left of Autumn Town roads. We're asking for 4 pieces in a Forage Box.
column13: Kalo was able to use the Cobblestone for repairs!
column14: Autumn Town did not get the resources it needed.

column12: Farmers are asking you to plant 10 new seeds to help propagate them across the Grove!
column14: Forage Request Failed
Forage Request Failed

column12: A bunch of leftover metal in the Sewers won't decompose. We need someone to go in and pick up 5 screws to prevent them from rusting over and polluting our waters.
column13: Sewer was properly cleaned of metals!
column14: Autumn Town's waters grow a bit more polluted.

column12: The town is growing chilly. Now would be a good time to gather kindling! Two Fatwood delivered to a Forage Box could help a bit!
column13: The Glade's fires were properly maintained.
column14: The Glade's furnace came close to dying out.

column12: The town is growing cold. We need supplies to replenish our kindling! Four Fatwood delivered to a Forage Box would go a long way!
column14: The Glade grew colder overnight.

column12: The Glade's snow is unrelenting. Ledidi says 6 Fatwood would help us stay the night in some comfort.
column14: Everyone slept in the cold tonight.

column12: The Cauldron in Winter Glade is becoming thin. If someone could Dowse for some Moon Kelp and deposit it into a Forage Box, it'd be a great help!
column13: Mandarin was able to fill the Cauldron up!
column14: Mandarin had a lot of difficulty with their work.

column12: The Summer Bar is exploring ways to manage their temperature the same way we do. If we can pull together 3 Tombstone, it'd help them a lot!
column13: The Outpost got the Tombstone they needed!
column14: The Outpost's troubles go unanswered.

column12: The Central Furnace's flame is about to die. We critically need larger kindling to sustain a larger fire.
Firekeepers in the Hamlet need someone to fetch a wood shipment from the Grove Crossroads in Spring Hamlet.
column14: Forage Request Failed

column12: Ledidi is asking for a couple of Rot Baubles from the Sewers. Not easy, but they're quite adamant that it's necessary for their work.
column13: Ledidi was able to conduct some studies on the Rot!
column14: The Rot's mysteries continue to persist.

column12: Our request to the Hamlet for Central Furnace wood burning supplies was fulfilled, and a package is waiting on the west end of Twilight Paddy!  Watch out, it's quite heavy!
column13: Wood supplies helped keep the Chimneys on!
column14: The Glade is experiencing a cold, cold night.

column12: Some people in Winter Glade are feeling the effects of the smoke. To snap them out of this haze, someone needs use Dew in their vicinity before they go home at nightfall!
column13: The villager's ailments were properly tended!
column14: Villagers went to bed with an awful headache.

column12: A few Chimneys in Misty Clearing need to be repaired. They can be thermally re-sealed with Tombstone.
column14: Emergency resources had to be used to fix the Chimneys.

column12: The local Archive has been feeling a bit cold. I think the outside Chimneys are broken. Could someone change out their Tombstone so I don't freeze in here?
column14: Emergency resources had to be used to fix the Chimneys.

column12: Plum used to maintain some old structures in the Mists. We need a Guardian to head in there and find some broken pads.
Plum used to maintain some old structures in the Mists. We need a Guardian to head in there and find a few dowsing levers.
Plum used to maintain some old structures in the Mists. We need a Guardian to head in there and find a few misplaced push-boxes.
A few heat-distribution lines have busted open, spewing smoke all over the Glade! I think someone could patch the leaks with some of the sap that grows in Twilight Paddy.
column13: Further pollution in the Glade was prevented!
column14: Heat and smoke spilled all over the Glade.

column12: A huge line to our furnace has busted open in Wonder Pond! The rot are gathering around the anomaly. Patch the leak up with sap before it's able to reach Pelo!
column13: Further pollution in the Glade was prevented!
column14: Heat and smoke spilled all over the Glade.

column12: The Glade grows thick with Rot. We're asking anyone who can enter the Mists to clear 5 Rot within there before they enter the town.
column13: The Rot was unable to congeal properly in the Glade.
column14: The Rot's danger went unanswered, harming our buildings.

column12: A group of Rot have cut off our guards from the rest of Winter Glade. Please clear them out of Twilight Paddy.
column13: Twilight Paddy remains safe for everyone!
column14: Villagers were unable to gather in Twilight Paddy.

column12: Some oozes have taken custody of a shipment of dry wood in Cube Coast. Someone needs to return the package to Winter Glade.
column14: The Rot ate our precious wood!

column12: Two Glomps have been cozying up next to the furnace at night! We need to get rid of them before they damage the heating system!
column13: The Furnace is safe and protected.
column14: The Rot stayed warm and cozy, but the Furnace was damaged.

column12: Glomp in the mists.
